tasks.label: Itch.io: Deliver kaplay for html5
tasks.command: pnpm web:build ; 7z a -tzip ./builds/web-build.zip ./dist/* ; butler push builds/web-build.zip your_name_here/your_game_name_here:html5 --userversion 1.0

tasks.label: Itch.io: Deliver kaplay desktop
tasks.command: pnpm build ; 7z a -tzip ./builds/desktop-build.zip ./src-tauri/target/release/*.exe ; butler push builds/desktop-build.zip your_name_here/your_game_here:windows --userversion 1.0
